meanings.sent1: The secret diary was unshared by anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The unshared toy belonged only to the little girl.
meanings.sent3: It was funny how the unshared pizza caused jealousy among friends.
meanings.sent4: Her unshared happiness radiated from her smile.
meanings.sent5: The unshared treasure was carefully hidden away.

meanings.definition: Not divided or distributed among multiple parties.
meanings.sent1: The unshared responsibility fell solely on his shoulders.
meanings.sent2: The unshared prize was waiting for the lucky winner.
meanings.sent3: The unshared cake was too big for just one person to finish.
meanings.sent4: His unshared attention made her feel special.
meanings.sent5: The unshared land stretched as far as the eye could see.
